item.title: House Democrat Sheila Cherfilus-McCormick charged with stealing $5M in Covid aid funds
item.description: Rep. Sheila Cherfilus-McCormick joined Congress in 2022 after winning a special election to fill the Florida seat of late Rep. Alcee Hastings.

item.title: Trump to meet with New York Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani at White House on Friday

item.title: Epstein files bill signed by Trump, starting 30-day timer for their release
item.description: The Jeffrey Epstein files bill was overwhelmingly passed by the House and Senate. Only Republican Rep. Clay Higgins of Louisiana voting against it.

item.title: Trump says he'd love to fire Powell, urges Bessent to 'work on' him to lower rates

item.title: Tom Steyer is running for California governor as a populist billionaire
